title: Inner Peace & Healing Sound Bath at The Sonrise Barn
description: Inner Peace & Healing Sound Bath at The Sonrise Barn Hosted By The Positive Pineapple. Event starts on Saturday, 9 September 2023 and happening at Sonrise Barn, Avon Lake, OH. Register or Buy Tickets, Price information.
cleaned_text: Sat Sep 09 2023 at 07:00 pm to 08:30 pm (GMT-04:00) Sonrise Barn, 31960 Krebs Road, Avon Lake, United States Inner Peace & Healing Sound Bath at The Sonrise Barn Join us for an evening of deep relaxation and rejuvenation at the Inner Peace & Healing Sound Bath at The Sonrise Barn. Immerse yourself in the soothing sounds and vibrations of various instruments, including crystal singing bowls, tibetan singing bowls, crystal singing pyramid, & more. Allow the healing frequencies to wash away stress and tension, promoting a sense of inner calm and balance. As you lie comfortably on a yoga mat, let the gentle waves of sound guide you into a state of deep relaxation and meditation. No prior experience is necessary. Simply come as you are, ready to unwind and find inner peace. This event offers a unique opportunity to escape the hustle and bustle of daily life and connect with yourself on a deeper level. Spaces are limited, so be sure to reserve your spot in advance. Come and experience the transformative power of sound as it harmonizes your body, mind, and spirit. What is Sound Healing? Sound healing uses sound waves to relax the body and bring it into a parasympathetic state that restores health. Sound healers use tuning forks, singing bowls, drums, gongs, chimes, and other instruments (including their voice), to create a soothing soundscape. The harmonious frequencies produced by these instruments help clear energetic blocks and promote flow and harmony within your mind, body, and soul. Could you benefit from sound healing? Stress plays a huge role in health issues and dis-ease. With countless distractions, stimulation, and noise in our modern world, it's challenging to reduce stress and recharge. Many people are turning to sound healing for relief. This form of acoustic therapy uses sound vibrations to relax the body and mind, leading to many benefits that support healing. Receiving the full benefits also depends on your intention. Sound Expert Jonathan Goldman says, "Frequency plus intent equals healing, which means the sound we make, coupled with the intention or the consciousness we put on the sound, creates the outcome of the sound." The more attentively you listen and allow the sound to wash over you (like a sound bath), the deeper your body relaxes. Many people also feel a spiritual connection that allows Divine insights to flow through and heighten the experience even more. Studies have shown that regular sessions of sound healing can have numerous beneficial effects on physical, emotional, and spiritual health. For example, a study published in the Journal of Evidence-Based Integrative Medicine found that sound healing reduced anxiety and improved mood in cancer patients receiving chemotherapy. Another study published in the International Journal of Behavioral Medicine found that sound healing improved sleep quality and reduced fatigue in people with sleep disorders. In addition, a study published in the Journal of Alternative and Complementary Medicine found that sound healing improved immune system function by increasing the production of immune cells in the body. Another study published in the Journal of Acupuncture and Meridian Studies found that sound healing reduced pain and inflammation in people with chronic pain conditions. Overall, these studies provide evidence that regular sessions of sound healing can have significant positive effects on physical, emotional, and spiritual health.
